## Angular Workspace Setup Complete

This is an Angular 17 application with:
- Server-Side Rendering (SSR) enabled
- Routing configured
- CSS styling
- TypeScript support
- VS Code tasks for running and testing

### Available Commands:
- `npm start` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm test` - Run unit tests
- `npm run serve:ssr:angular-app` - Run SSR server

- Tasks configured in `.vscode/tasks.json`
- Launch configurations in `.vscode/launch.json`
- Angular Language Service extension installed
